name: Kamer Roasted Red Peppers
description: Roasted Red Peppers have a deep, sweet flavour, which takes your dish to the next level. Blitz them up into a hummus, add into a salad, soup, pizza or charcuterie board. They are so good, we actually eat them with a bit of salt, olive oil and balsamic vinegar.*Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
